Please confirm the following terms to continue

 	■ You are participating in this project voluntarily.
 	■ You understand that you're free to stop at any time.
 	■ All your submitted responses will be sent to Google.
 	■ All your submitted responses will be used in analytics purposes in the future works related to perspective API. 
 	■ There can be hate speech, cursing or sexual comments in a question.

In a world filled with screened identities, where your only interaction is through a light box and a ridiculous username it’s easy to hurl insults, but it’s difficult to completely rid the world of this menace. ToxicMania accomplishes this social cause with the power of crowdsourcing. Because where a few fail, many can prosper.

By using toxicmania you contribute to identify the toxic sentences that people use in day-today life. These data will be sent to Google to improve their perspective API , which will improve online conversations in the future.
Comments posted by people in online conversations that could make others feel uncomfortable, insulted, abused, threatened or hurt.
You need to rate given comments by it\'s toxic level. Below are the index for the toxic ratings.
If the sentence is not readable in english, please un-check "Readable in English" check box and submit.

ToxicMania has two sets of comments as \"New Comments\" and \"Pre-Rated Comments\". When players request comments to rate, we mix in \"Pre-Rated Comments\" as well, depending on the number of points. Player given ratings and original ratings for \"Pre-Rated Comments\" will be matched to generate each player\'s final marks.

You can now play with your friends and beat them in personal challenge matches. Just hit Multiplayer button in home and choose to start a new game or join using a game ID. Each game will receive 20 comments to rate and 4 minutes for players to finish rating them. Timer will begin once the game owner starts the game. Players will be given marks based on the correctness and time they spent to submit.
